wordpressPost.title: Gearing Up for the Employee Engagement Conference & Awards
wordpressPost.content:
In just a few short weeks, we will honor and celebrate the people driving employee engagement within their organizations at the first ever North American Employee Engagements Awards program. And, as one of the companies that is helping bring the awards to the region, we’re excited to share with you the amazing successes of the winning entries. On June 17, following a packed day of sessions at the Employee Engagement Conference, we’ll unwind high above the hustle and bustle of the streets of New York City and honor these remarkable programs.

Conference Take-Aways

But first, a word about the conference. Founded by Manners & Murphy and produced in partnership with Sift Media and WeSpire, the Employee Engagement Conference is a one-day day event with a line-up of inspiring speakers who will share insights, strategies and tools. Attendees will leave with:

  • 7 tangible actions that you must focus on to create measurable improvement
  • A practical roadmap to encourage engaged employees
  • The common employee engagement mistakes most organizations make and how to avoid them
  • How the work environment impacts individuals and what this means for performance
  • How to help your employees find their purpose and kick start their engagement
  • And why culture is the temperature gauge of your organization

If employee engagement is part of your charter, you do not want to miss this one-day event (register here.)
Now, to the awards! We’re celebrating the game-changing, forward-thinking companies that are doing things differently to create an engaging and rewarding work environment and drive company performance. The judges have selected finalists including Ford, MetLife, Caesars Entertainment, Tata Consulting, ASPCA, Sony Pictures and Maritz in categories ranging from Employee Engagement Company of the Year’ to Best use of Technology in Employee Engagement.’
Join us in congratulating these companies during what is sure to be an amazing evening! We look forward to seeing you in New York!
